bloodType.name: Cajun Ribs
bloodType.description: For lovers of a spicy touch. Ribs bathed in our Original sauce accompanied by Cajun spices. Served with French fries and coleslaw.

bloodType.name: The Original Baby Backs
bloodType.description: The house specialty. Pork ribs cooked on the barbecue and marinated with our original barbecue sauce. Served with French fries and coleslaw.

bloodType.name: Carolina Honey
bloodType.description: Our famous ribs marinated with our Carolina honey sauce, a mixture of honey with our original sauce. Ideal for those looking for a sweet touch. Served with French fries and coleslaw.

bloodType.name: Onion Rings
bloodType.description: Los tradicionales aros de cebolla de tony roma´s dorados, crujientes y ligeros. Únicos en el mundo, acompañados de salsa BBQ.

bloodType.name: Nachos Tony Roma's
bloodType.description: The best selling nachos! with our blend of melted cheeses, accompanied by guacamole, crispy bacon, ranch beans, and sour cream.

bloodType.name: Burger Mustang
bloodType.description: Homemade bread, burger sauce, lettuce, sweet and sour pickle, bacon, cheddar and BBQ sauce. Beef 180 grams.

bloodType.name: Alabama bread
bloodType.description: Artisan bread, butter sauce, garlic, BBQ chicken and cheddar.

bloodType.name: New York Burger
bloodType.description: Homemade bread, lettuce, burger sauce, 180 grams of beef, goat cheese and roasted apple.

bloodType.name: Mac & Cheese Burger
bloodType.description: Homemade bread, lettuce, burger sauce, 180 grams of beef, mac and cheese, and American-style bacon.

bloodType.name: Nachos Brothers
bloodType.description: Nachos, guacamole, cheddar sauce, beans, bacon, and cream cheese.

bloodType.name: English burger
bloodType.description: Beef with bacon, portobello mushrooms, tomato, cheddar cheese, grilled egg and our smoked sauce.

bloodType.name: Mexican Burger
bloodType.description: Beef, with pico de gallo, veggie chili, cheddar cheese, guacamole and smoked sauce.

bloodType.name: Tequeños
bloodType.description: Crispy sticks filled with melted cheese accompanied by tomato chutney.

bloodType.name: Starters Combo
bloodType.description: Tequeños, crispy onion and chicken delicacies.

bloodType.name: Cesar Salad
bloodType.description: Green sprouts, pieces of grilled bacon, chicken delicacies, grated Parmesan, muffin croutons and fried onion confetti dressed with Caesar sauce.
